questions.question: She awaited the arrival of her ………………………….. from Europe.
We were ………………………………….. spirits and were quite compatible.
I wish I had her knack …………………………. cooking.
He was quite ……………………………. about current events.
questions.description: Knowledgeable means well-informed or conversant with.

questions.question: Kudos ………………………….. all I expect for my work.
questions.description: Kudos is singular and should be used with a singular verb.

questions.question: Although his speeches were …………………………., they were informative.
questions.description: Laconic means concise or brief. It is the opposite of wordy or verbose.

questions.question: ……………………………… I have taken to making my own clothes.
This shampoo makes a lot of ……………………………….
I like both Mumbai and Bangalore, but I prefer the ……………………………..
questions.description: The latter means the second of two.

questions.question: Father likes to take the …………………………….. traveled roads.
Of the two actors, he is the ……………………………… known.
questions.description: Lesser means to a smaller degree.

questions.question: ……………………………. here until the dizziness goes away.
questions.description: Lie means rest or be flat.
